headline: Pentair to Release Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Earnings and Host Investor Conference Call on February 4
summary: LONDON, January 21, 2025--Pentair plc will report its fourth quarter and full year 2024 results before the opening of the New York Stock Exchange on Tuesday, February 4, 2025.
